title: Jenny Herrera
deck: I love being a part of Gateway Church and I believe our children Jonathan and Gabriela are privileged to be growing up in this environment. I am married to Josue who I met when a missionary in Guatemala (he now also goes by the name Dominic as easier to pronounce). You will often see me playing the keys in the worship group which I love doing! I also run a Christian charity called Acts 435.
